subject: asset(icons): redesign SVG — blue tones, short sides, comb-over, bushy beard
body:
Replaced yellow emoji skin with monochrome blue palette. Hair now has
short cropped sides with a side part and top combed left-to-right.
Removed neck and shoulders — head only. Kept bushy beard, rounded
rectangle glasses, and generic simple style.
